title: terminal "go run filename.go" command error
body:
by **batuhangoksu**: 
terminal "go run filename.go" command error

# crypto/x509
/usr/local/go/src/pkg/crypto/x509/root_darwin.go:11:43: error:
CoreFoundation/CoreFoundation.h: No such file or directory
/usr/local/go/src/pkg/crypto/x509/root_darwin.go:12:31: error: Security/Security.h: No
such file or directory

src/all.bash run error

darkofpain:~ darkofpain$ cd /usr/local/go/src
darkofpain darkofpain$ ./all.bash
# Building C bootstrap tool.
cmd/dist
ld: can't open output file for writing: cmd/dist/dist, errno=13 for architecture x86_64
collect2: ld returned 1 exit status
